content.text: Hello! What do you do for work?
I'm a marketing manager at a tech company.
I'm a painter. I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite music venues.
That sounds fun! I love to cycle and read in my free time.
I enjoy surfing and going to yoga. I try to maintain a healthy diet.
I love to eat take out food. It's so convenient.
I used to eat a lot of take out, but I've been trying to eat healthier.
I have always had long hair. I've never dyed it.
I just dyed my hair blonde. I think I'm going to keep it this color.
